en.bdb: He is without affection colour and without any mark!

pu.bdb: ijs dw (koeI) rwg, rMg, Awkwr nhIN hY, nw koeI rog hY,

transliteration.en: jeh raag na ra(n)g na rekh ruga(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जिह राग न रंग न रेख रुगं ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه راگ ن رںگ ن رےکھ رُگں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh sog n Bog n jog jugM ]

en.bdb: He is without sorrow enjoyment and association with Yoga!

pu.ss: ijs nUM nw (koeI) sog, Bog hY Aqy nw hI jog nwl sMbMiDq hY,
pu.bdb: ijs nUM nw (koeI) sog, Bog hY Aqy nw hI jog nwl sMbMiDq hY,

transliteration.en: jeh sog na bhog na jog juga(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जिह सोग न भोग न जोग जुगं ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه سوگ ن بھوگ ن جوگ جُگں ۔۔

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer of the Earth and the Primal Creator!

pu.ss: (jo) BUmI dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy mu`F kdIm qoN ies dI isrjnw krn vwlw hY,
pu.bdb: (jo) BUmI dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy mu`F kdIm qoN ies dI isrjnw krn vwlw hY,

en.bdb: The gods demons and men all make obeisance to Him! 15. 155

pu.ss: ijs dI dyvqy, dYNq Aqy mnu`K bMdnw krdy hn ]15]155]
pu.bdb: ijs dI dyvqy, dYNq Aqy mnu`K bMdnw krdy hn ]15]155]

en.bdb: He Created Ganas Kinnars Yakshas and serpents!

pu.ss: (ijs ny) gx, ikMnr, XkS Aqy s`p rcy hn;
pu.bdb: (ijs ny) gx, ikMnr, XkS Aqy s`p rcy hn;

en.bdb: He Created the gems rubies pearls and jewels!

pu.ss: mxIAW, mwxk, moqI, lwl swjy hn;
pu.bdb: mxIAW, mwxk, moqI, lwl swjy hn;

en.bdb: His Glory is Unassailable and His account is Eternal!

pu.ss: (jo) nw Gtx vwlI SoBw Aqy Amuk ibR`qwq vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: (jo) nw Gtx vwlI SoBw Aqy Amuk ibR`qwq vwlw hY;

verses.gurmukhi: ijh pwr n pwvq pUr mqM ]16]156]

en.bdb: No  one of perfect wisdom could know His Limits! 16. 156

pu.ss: ijs dw AMq pUrn bu`DImwn vI nhIN pw skdy ]16]156]
pu.bdb: ijs dw AMq pUrn bu`DImwn vI nhIN pw skdy ]16]156]

transliteration.en: jeh paar na paavat poor mata(n) ||16||156||
transliteration.hi: जिह पार न पावत पूर मतं ॥१६॥१५६॥
transliteration.ur: جِه پار ن پاوت پُور متں ۔۔۱۶۔۔۱۵۶۔۔

en.bdb: His is the Invincible Entity and His Glory is Unpunishable!

pu.ss: (ijs dw) srUp AKMf Aqy SoBw Aruk hY,
pu.bdb: (ijs dw) srUp AKMf Aqy SoBw Aruk hY,

en.bdb: All the Vedas and Puranas hail Him!

pu.ss: swry vyd Aqy purwx (ijs dI) jY jY jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: swry vyd Aqy purwx (ijs dI) jY jY jpdy hn,

en.bdb: The Vedas and Katebs (Semitic Scriptures) call Him Infinite!

pu.ss: ijs nUM vyd Aqy kqyb byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn,
pu.bdb: ijs nUM vyd Aqy kqyb byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn,

verses.gurmukhi: ijh BUq ABUq n Byd lhY ]17]157]

en.bdb: The Gross and Subtle both could not know His Secret! 17. 157

pu.ss: ijs dw sQUl Aqy sUKm koeI vI Byd nhIN pw skdw ]17]157]
pu.bdb: ijs dw sQUl Aqy sUKm koeI vI Byd nhIN pw skdw ]17]157]

transliteration.en: jeh bhoot abhoot na bhedh lahai ||17||157||
transliteration.hi: जिह भूत अभूत न भेद लहै ॥१७॥१५७॥
transliteration.ur: جِه بھُوت ابھُوت ن بھےد لهَے ۔۔۱۷۔۔۱۵۷۔۔

en.bdb: The Vedas Puranas and Katebs pray to Him!

pu.ss: ijs nUM vyd, purwn Aqy kqyb jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: ijs nUM vyd, purwn Aqy kqyb jpdy hn,

en.bdb: The son of ocean ie moon with face upside down performs austerities for His realization!

pu.ss: smuMdr dw pu`qr (cMdRmw ijs dw) mUDy mUMh qp kr irhw hY;
pu.bdb: smuMdr dw pu`qr (cMdRmw ijs dw) mUDy mUMh qp kr irhw hY;

verses.gurmukhi: keI klpn lO qp qwp krY ]

en.bdb: He performs austerities for many kalpas (ages) !

pu.ss: keI (swDk) klpw ijMny lMby smyW qoN qpisAw ivc mgn hn,
pu.bdb: keI (swDk) klpw ijMny lMby smyW qoN qpisAw ivc mgn hn,

transliteration.en: kiee kalapan lau tap taap karai ||
transliteration.hi: कई कलपन लौ तप ताप करै ॥
transliteration.ur: کای کلپن لَو تپ تاپ کرَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nhI nYku ikRpw iniD pwn prY ]18]158]

en.bdb: Still the Merciful Lord is not realized by him even for a short while! 18. 158

pu.ss: (pr aunHw dy) ikRpwinD (pRBU) iblkul h`Q nhIN lg irhw ]18]158]
pu.bdb: (pr aunHw dy) ikRpwinD (pRBU) iblkul h`Q nhIN lg irhw ]18]158]

transliteration.en: nahee naik kirapaa nidh paan parai ||18||158||
transliteration.hi: नही नैकु कृपा निधि पान परै ॥१८॥१५८॥
transliteration.ur: نهیِ نَےک کرپا ندھ پان پرَے ۔۔۱۸۔۔۱۵۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh Pokt Drm sBY qij hY ]

en.bdb: Those who forsake all the fake religions !

pu.ss: ijhVy lok swry ivArQ Drm kwrj Cf idMdy hn
pu.bdb: ijhVy lok swry ivArQ Drm kwrj Cf idMdy hn

transliteration.en: jeh fokaT dharam sabhai taj hai ||
transliteration.hi: जिह फोकट धरम सभै तजि है ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه پھوکٹ دھرم سبھَے تج هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iek ic`q ikRpw iniD ko jip hYN ]

en.bdb: And meditate on the Merciful Lord single-mindedly !

pu.ss: Aqy iekwgr mn nwl prmwqmw nUM jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: Aqy iekwgr mn nwl prmwqmw nUM jpdy hn,

transliteration.en: eik chi't kirapaa nidh ko jap hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: इक चित्त कृपा निधि को जपि हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ِاک چّت کرپا ندھ کو جپِ هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qyaU Xw Bv swgr ko qr hYN ]

en.bdb: They ferry across this dreadful world-ocean !

pu.ss: auhI (lok) Bv-swgr nUM qrdy hn,
pu.bdb: auhI (lok) Bv-swgr nUM qrdy hn,

transliteration.en: teuoo yaa bhav saagar ko tar hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: तेऊ या भव सागर को तर हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: تےاُو ےا بھو ساگر کو تر هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Bv BUl n dyih punr Dr hYN ]19]159]

en.bdb: And never come again in human body even by mistake! 19. 159

pu.ss: iPr Bul ky vI jgq ivc SrIr Dwrn nhIN krdy (Bwv mukq ho jwdy hn) ]19]159]
pu.bdb: iPr Bul ky vI jgq ivc SrIr Dwrn nhIN krdy (Bwv mukq ho jwdy hn) ]19]159]

transliteration.en: bhav bhool na dheh punar dhar hai(n) ||19||159||
transliteration.hi: भव भूल न देहि पुनर धर हैं ॥१९॥१५९॥
transliteration.ur: بھو بھُول ن دےه پُنر دھر هَےں ۔۔۱۹۔۔۱۵۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iek nwm ibnw nhI kot bRqI ]

en.bdb: Without One Lord’s Name one cannot be saved even by millions of fasts!

pu.ss: iek nwm (dy ismrn) qoN ibnw kroVw vrqw (nwl mukqI) nhIN huMdI,
pu.bdb: iek nwm (dy ismrn) qoN ibnw kroVw vrqw (nwl mukqI) nhIN huMdI,

transliteration.en: eik naam binaa nahee koT bratee ||
transliteration.hi: इक नाम बिना नही कोट ब्रती ॥

en.bdb: The Superb Shrutis (of the Vedas) declare thus!

pu.ss: ies pRkwr dy vydw dy kQn srsvqI aucwrdI hY।
pu.bdb: ies pRkwr dy vydw dy kQn srsvqI aucwrdI hY।

verses.gurmukhi: joaU vw rs ky csky rs hYN ]

en.bdb: Those who are absorbed with the ambrosia of the Name even by Mistake !

pu.ss: ijnHw nUM aus rs dw cskw lg igAw hY,
pu.bdb: ijnHw nUM aus rs dw cskw lg igAw hY,

transliteration.en: jouoo vaa ras ke chasake ras hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जोऊ वा रस के चसके रस हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جواُو وا رس کے چسکے رس هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qyaU BUl n kwl PMDw Pis hYN ]20]160]

en.bdb: They will not be entrapped in he snare of death! 20. 160

pu.ss: auh Bul ky vI kwl dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]20]160]
pu.bdb: auh Bul ky vI kwl dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]20]160]

transliteration.en: teuoo bhool na kaal fa(n)dhaa fas hai(n) ||20||160||
transliteration.hi: तेऊ भूल न काल फंधा फसि हैं ॥२०॥१६०॥
transliteration.ur: تےاُو بھُول ن کال پھںدھا پھس هَےں ۔۔۲۰۔۔۱۶۰۔۔
